title: MCP Server Configuration Support
description: GitHub updated MCP server with support for tool-specific configuration and enhanced server capabilities.

title: Early December Platform Updates
description: GitHub shipped significant early December updates across Spaces, Visual Studio, and expanded model options for Copilot users.

title: Model Picker Feature
description: GitHub added model selection functionality allowing users to choose between different AI models for Copilot.

title: Visual Studio November Update
description: GitHub released Copilot updates for Visual Studio including general availability of Visual Studio 2026 and new Copilot actions.

title: Claude Sonnet 4.5 Release
description: Anthropic released Claude Sonnet 4.5, the latest model upgrade specifically optimized for coding tasks and enhanced autonomous capabilities.
